battlecode.common

Class RobotInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • battlecode.common.RobotInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BodyInfo

    public class RobotInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements BodyInfo
    Struct that stores basic information that was 'sensed' of another Robot. This info is ephemeral and there is no guarantee any of it will remain the same between rounds.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int attackCount
      The number of times this robot has attacked in the current turn.
      float health
      The current health of the robot.
      int ID
      The unique ID of the robot.
      MapLocation location
      The current location of the robot.
      int moveCount
      The number of times this robot has moved in the current turn.
      Team team
      The Team that the robot is on.
      RobotType type
      The type of the robot.
